Cookies are files installed on your computer or other devices while you browse the Site, aiming to fulfill a specific purpose.
The BRETON® Website may place certain primary cookies on your computer or mobile device. Primary cookies are those placed directly by BRETON® and are used exclusively by it.
BRETON® uses cookies to facilitate and improve the experience of its Users on the Site, in order to continuously provide and improve its Services. BRETON® carefully selects each and every cookie to be used, as well as takes all reasonable measures to ensure that the privacy and personal data of its Users are protected and respected at all times.
By using the BRETON® Site, you may also receive some third-party cookies on your computer or mobile device. Third-party cookies are those placed by websites, third-party services dissociated from BRETON®. Third-party cookies are used on the site for marketing, advertising, and product dissemination. For more details, see the table below. These cookies are not essential for the functioning of the BRETON® Site and your use and experience on the BRETON® Site will not be harmed by refusing consent to use such cookies, specifically.
By accessing the BRETON® Site, it may use advertising cookies. These cookies help BRETON® and partner companies to personalize ads that are shown to you, User, when accessing the Services offered by BRETON®, as well as on other websites. If activated, these cookies will also allow third parties involved in interest-based advertising on our Site to recognize your browser software on other websites.
All cookies used by, and on the BRETON® Site are used in accordance with the current Law No. 13.709/18. Before cookies are placed on your computer or mobile device, a privacy notice will be displayed, for example, a pop-up requesting the User's consent to set such cookies.
By providing your consent for BRETON® to place cookies, the User will be consenting for BRETON® to offer the best possible experience and Services. The User may, if desired, deny consent for the placement of cookies. However, certain features of the BRETON® Site may not function fully or as intended. The User will have the opportunity to change any and all primary cookie settings and block third-party cookies at any time, from the first access to the BRETON® Site.
Certain features of the BRETON® Site depend on cookies to function, these are called “necessary cookies”. Such cookies are listed in the table below. The User's consent will not be requested to place these cookies, but it is still important that all Users have easy access and knowledge about them. The User may also block them by changing their Internet browser settings, as detailed below, but should be aware that the BRETON® Site may not function correctly if certain cookies are disabled.
BRETON® adopts all technical and administrative measures to ensure adequate protection and security in all processes of possession of the User's personal data, in accordance with current legislation, especially Law No. 13.709/18, General Personal Data Protection Law.

policies.subtitle: data collection, use, and storage
policies.text:
BIOMA COMÉRCIO DE MÓVEIS LTDA – CNPJ: 42.800.463/0001-88
1. About BRETON:
1.1. BIOMA COMERCIO DE MÓVEIS LTDA. (“BRETON®”) is a family business consolidated in the exclusive furniture market and operates throughout the national territory and is expanding internationally, having already opened the brand's first foreign store in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

1.2. The brand “BRETON®” is a registered trademark with national and international intellectual and industrial property protection agencies, whose ownership belongs to the group of companies legally holding the “BRETON®” brand.

1.3. In Brazilian territory, BRETON® owns the official website https:/www.breton.com.br/ (“Site”), having tools which we collectively refer to in this Policy as “Services”.
This Policy applies only to the use of the official BRETON® Site.

1.3.1. The BRETON® Site may contain links to other websites. Therefore, it will be important to demonstrate that BRETON® has no control over how our Users' data is collected, stored, or used by other websites. Due to these considerations, we advise you to check the terms and conditions of use and the privacy policies of any of these websites before providing any data to third parties.
Check our complete privacy policy: Click here.
